alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Star Valley; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:28PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sublette, northwestern Lincoln and southwestern Teton Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Palisades Reservoir, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jackson around 235 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Star Valley; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Upper Green River Basin Foothills
